name: Deeper Than Light
description:
Deeper Than Light is a small metroidvania game where you try to find your way through darkness as small light sparkle. But darkness is a dangerous adventure and you should be careful about not to lose your light.

This is my second LudumDare. This time I’ve gone for compo and choose a risky genre actually. In last 48 hours I learned, 2 days is not enough to build a satisfying metroidvania game. At least for me. Unfortunately, I didn’t have time to add SFX. Literally, there is no sound in the game. However, I am pretty satisfied with the other things. Visualization, core mechanics, level design etc. Long story short, I hope you’ll like it :)

Çınar, 

Game On!!

NOTE: You might have performance issues on HTML5.(It is playable but I had some FPS drops) So, desktop version is recommended!
